items.title: Pet Sitting Certificate
items.headline: A course suitable for anyone wishing to enhance their knowledge as a pet sitter
objectives_summary: This course is  perfect for anyone wanting to enhance their knowledge and skills as a pet sitter.  Learn about the realities of being a pet sitter, and become competent in the care, health and welfare of a variety of pet species.  It includes information on UK pet legislation. This course comprises of Module 2 of the Professional Pet Sitting Diploma.
